title: hindu dharmam engaL
sahitya:
hindu dharmam engaL dharmamE ihapara sukha marmamE Om


anupallavi

  cintaikkiniya tiruvAcakam tirumantiram tirukkuraL gItai
tiruppugazh shiva jnAna bOdham tiruvAi mozhi uruvAi vaLar ulaga samayam


caraNam 1    sariyai giriyai yOga jnAna sAdhanangaLait-tulakki sakalAtma vidyA 
shiva tattuvangaLai viLakki ariya uyirai irai nilaikkE uriyadAga mATri 
anbu malarndE aruL kanindE inba rasam pozhi amuda shOlai
    caraNam 2    onrE kaDavuL onrE ulagam oru kulam uyirt-toghaiyE uLLak-kOyilil
uLLE viLangum uNmai arivu niraivAi nanrE Anma orumai kUDi ninrE 
manadai venrE nAnaduvEnum jnAnAnandat-tEnai uNDu tiLaikkum deiva
